name: ide-purescript
description: PureScript IntelliSense, tooltip, errors with psc-ide

purescript.pursExe.description: Location of purs executable (resolved wrt PATH)

purescript.useCombinedExe.description: Whether to use the new combined purs executable. This will default to true in the future then go away.

purescript.pscIdeServerExe.description: Location of psc-ide server executable (resolved wrt PATH)

purescript.autoStartPscIde.description: Whether to automatically start psc-ide when editing a PureScript file (includes connecting to an existing running instance). If this is disabled, various features like autocomplete, tooltips, and other type info will not work until start command is run manually.

purescript.packagePath.description: Path to installed packages. Will be used to control globs passed to IDE server for source locations.

purescript.sourcePath.description: Path to application source root. Will be used to control globs passed to IDE server for source locations.

purescript.buildCommand.description: Build command to use with arguments. Not passed to shell. eg `pulp build -- --json-errors` (this default requires pulp >=10)

purescript.censorWarnings.title: Censor warnings
purescript.censorWarnings.description: The warning codes to censor, both for fast rebuild and a full build. Unrelated to any psa setup. e.g.: ["ShadowedName","MissingTypeDeclaration"]

purescript.autocompleteAllModules.description: Whether to always autocomplete from all built modules, or just those imported in the file. Suggestions from all modules always available by explicitly triggering autocomplete.

purescript.autocompleteAddImport.description: Whether to automatically add imported identifiers when accepting autocomplete result.

purescript.autocompleteLimit.description: Maximum number of results to fetch for an autocompletion request. May improve performance on large projects.

purescript.autocompleteGrouped.description: Whether to group completions in autocomplete results. Requires compiler 0.11.6

purescript.importsPreferredModules.description: Module to prefer to insert when adding imports which have been re-exported. In order of preference, most preferred first.

purescript.addNpmPath.description: Whether to add the local npm bin directory to the PATH for psc-ide-server and build command.
